mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.hetong_name as hetongName ,a.hetong_file as hetongFile ,a.hetong_text as hetongText ,a.hetong_delete as hetongDelete ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM hetong a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.hetong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.hetongName},'%')
and a.hetong_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.hetongText},'%')
and a.hetong_delete >= #{params.hetongDeleteStart}
and a.hetong_delete <= #{params.hetongDeleteEnd}
and a.hetong_delete = #{params.hetongDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
